item.title: [Python] Landscape transformation by AI † Different world transformation †
item.description: # Introduction († horror transformation †) Before conversion After conversion ! Did you understand? This uses GAN (Hostile Generation Network) to add “horror” features to photos and convert them. Let’s leave the principle behind for now, and take a look at the possibilities of GAN! Seasonal conversion, Aurora conversion, Fireworks conversion Before conversion After conversion !
